page.title: 10N.F.Council:Complaints
page.content: The New Forest District Council at Lyndhurst receives a variety of complaints mainly concerned with planning or housing matters. To make a complaint you can go about it in 2 ways:-One way is to write to the chief executive who in turn will write to the officer in charge of the department concerned and hopefully the matter will be settled. Another way probably the more effective, is to write to your Member of Parliament for your area. He will then correspond with the chief executive. If the reply does not satisfy, he will get in touch with the ombudsman who will look into the case, personally.
